metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2620 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in WebUI in Google Chrome on Chrome OS prior to104.0.5112.79 allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engage inspecific user interactions to potentially exploit heap corruption viaspecific UI interactions.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
